Translations.Text: (Hajarata ibrahima alai.) Mhanale ki allahane pathavilelya (pharistyam) no! Tumacya (yenyaca) hetu kaya
Tyanni uttara dile ki amhi aparadhi lokankade pathavile gelo ahota
Yasathi ki amhi tyacyavara (bhajalelya) maticya dagadanca varsava karava
Je tumacya palanakartyatarphe cinhankita jhale aheta tya maryada bhanga karanaryankarita
Tevha jevadhe imana rakhanare tithe hote, amhi tyanna tethuna kadhale
Ani amhala tithe musalamanance phakta ekaca ghara adhalale
Ani amhi tithe tyancyasathi, je duhkhadayaka siksa yatanece bhaya balagatata, eka purna cinha sodale
Ani musacya vrttantata (hi amacyatarphe tambi ahe) jevha amhi tyanna phira'aunakade spasta pramanasaha pathavile
Tevha tyane apalya samarthyacya ghamendita tonda phiravile, ani mhanale, ha (ekatara) jadugara ahe kinva vedasara ahe
Sevati amhi tyala ani tyacya sain'yala apalya siksa-yataneta dharuna, samudrata takale. To hotaca nirbhartsana karanyayogya
Tyacapramane adacya lokammadhyehi (amacyatarphe tambi ahe) jevha amhi tyancyavara vanjha (asubha) vadala pathavile
Te jya jya vastuvaruna gele, tila jirna hadampramane curecura karuna takale
Ani samuda (cya vrttanta) madhyehi (bodha) ahe, jevha tyanna sangitale gele ki tumhi kahi divasaparyanta labha prapta karuna ghya
Parantu tyanni apalya palanakartyacya adesace palana kele nahi, jyabaddala tyanna eka bhayankara garjanene nasta karuna takale ani te baghataca rahile
Maga na tara te ubhe rahu sakale, ani na suda ghe'u sakale
Ani nuha (alai.) Yancya janasamuhaci dekhila yacya adhi (hica avastha jhali hoti) te dekhila mothe avajnakari loka hote
Ani akasala amhi (apalya) hatanni banavile ahe ani nihsansaya, amhi vyapaka karanare ahota
Ani jaminila amhi bicha'ita banavile ahe, tevha amhi kiti cangale bicha'ita karanare ahota
Ani pratyeka vastula amhi jodi jodine nirmana kele ahe,1 yasathi ki tumhi bodha grahana karava
Tevha tumhi allahakade dhava ghya. Nihsansaya, mi tumhala tyacyatarphe khabaradara karanara ahe
Ani allahasobata dusarya konalahi upasya (daivata) banavu naka, niscitaca, mi tumhala tyacyatarphe spastatah savadha karanara ahe
Asaca prakare je loka tyancya purvi ho'una geleta, tyancyajavala jo dekhila paigambara ala, tyala te mhanale ki ekatara ha jadugara ahe kinva veda
Kaya he, ya gostici ekamekanna takida karata geleta, navhe, kimbahuna he sarva vidrohi (unmatta) loka aheta
Tevha tumhi tyancyakaduna tonda phiravuna ghya, tumacyavara kasalahi dosaropa nahi
Ani upadesa karita raha, nihsansaya ha upadesa imana rakhanaryanna labha de'ila
Mi jinnanna ani manavanna phakta asasathi nirmana kele ahe ki tyanni kevala majhi upasana karavi
Tyancyakaduna mi na ajivika (roji) icchito na ase icchito ki tyanni mala kha'u ghalave
Nihsansaya, allaha svatah roji denara samarthyasali va balavana ahe
Tevha jya lokanni atyacara kela ahe, tyannahi tyancya sathidarancya hissya'itakaca his'sa milela, yastava tyanni majhyasi gha'ine magu naye
Tevha durdasa ahe kaphiransathi, tyancya tya divasi jyaca tyanna vayada dila jata ahe
Sapatha ahe turaci
Ani likhita granthaci
Jo patala camadyacya khulya prsthammadhye ahe
Ani abada gharaci
Ani bulanda chataci
Ani uphalalelya sagaraci
Nihsansaya, tumacya palanakartyaca prakopa ho'ilaca
Tyala koni rokhanara nahi
Jya divasi akasa tharatharu lagela
Ani parvata calayala lagatila
Tya divasi khote tharavinaryanca sarvanasa ahe
Je apalya vahyata gostimmadhye khelata bagadata aheta
Jya divasi tyanna dhakke de'una jahannamacya agikade anale ja'ila
Hica ti (jahannamaci) aga hoya, jila tumhi khote tharavita hote
(Ata sanga) kaya hi jadu ahe? Ki tumhi pahataca nahita
Dakhala vha yata (jahannamamadhye) ata tumace dhira-sanyama rakhane ani na rakhane tumacyasathi sarakheca ahe. Tumhala kevala tumacya karmanca mobadala dila ja'ila
Nihsansaya, neka sadacari loka jannatamadhye sukhammadhye aheta
Tyanna, tyancya palanakartyane je de'una thevale ahe tyavara khusa aheta ani tyanna tyancya palanakartyane jahannamacya azaba (siksa-yatane) pasunahi vacavile
Tumhi majene khata-pita raha, tya karmancya mobadalyata ji tumhi karita hote
Barobarine mandalelya sundara asananvara takke lavuna, ani amhi tyaca vivaha mothya nenacya hura (parim) si karavila ahe

Ani jya lokanni imana rakhale, ani tyancya santatinehi imana rakhanyata tyance anusarana kele, amhi tyancya santatila tyancyaparyanta pohacavu ani amhi tyancya karmammadhuna kahica kami karanara nahi. Pratyeka manusya apapalya karmancya badali gahana ahe
Ani amhi tyancyasathi meve ani svadista mansaci adhikata karu
(Anandane) te ekamekampasuna (madyace) pyale hisakavuna gheta asatila, tya madyacya svadata na vahyata gosti bolatila ani na aparadha asela
Ani tyancya cari bajula sevesathi (sevaka mhanuna) lahana mule phirata asatila, janu kahi te moti hote, jyanna lapavuna thevale hote
Ani te apasata ekamekankade tonda karuna vicarapusa karatila
Mhanatila ki yacyapurvi apalya kutumbiyammadhye phara bhaya rakhata hoto
Tevha allahane amacyavara phara motha upakara kela ani amhala horapaluna takanarya ati usna havecya prakopa (azaba) pasuna vacavile
Amhi yacya purvihi tyala pukarata hoto. Nihsansaya, to motha upakara karanara ani motha daya karanara ahe
Tevha tumhi samajavita raha, karana ki tumhi apalya palanakartyacya krpene na tara jyotisi ahata, na vedasara
Kaya (kaphira) ase mhanatata ki ha kavi ahe, amhi tyacyasathi kala cakra (arthata mrtyu) ci pratiksa karita ahota
(Tumhi) sanga ki tumhi pratiksa kara mi dekhila tumacyasobata pratiksa karanaryampaiki ahe
Kaya tyancya akala tyanna heca sikavitata? Kinva he loka ahetaca udhdata (vidrohi)
Kaya he mhanata ki ya (paigambara) ne (kura'ana) svatah racale ahe, vastutah he imana rakhata nahita
Bare, jara he sacce aheta tara maga yasarakhi eka tari gosta yanni anuna dakhavavi
Kaya he ekhadya (nirmana karanarya) cya vina svatah (apo'apa) nirmana jhale aheta? Kinva he svatah nirmana karanare aheta
Kaya tyannica akasanna ani jaminila nirmana kele ahe? Kimbahuna he visvasa na rakhanare loka aheta
Athava kaya yancyajavala tumacya palanakartyace khajine aheta? Kinva (tya khajin'yance) he sanraksaka aheta
Kinva yancyajavala ekhadi sidi ahe, jicyavara cadhuna he aikatata? (Jara ase ahe) tara aikanaryane ekhade spasta pramana sadara karave
Kaya allahakarita sarva kan'ya aheta ani tumacyasathi putra
Kaya tumhi yancyakaduna kahi majuri magata ki he tya ojhyane dabale jata aheta
Kaya yancyajavala paroksa jnana ahe ki he lihuna gheta asatata
Kaya he loka ekhada kavebajapana karu icchitata? Tara (visvasa theva) ki kapata karasthana karanara gata kaphiranca ahe
Kaya allahakherija tyanca koni dusara mabuda (upasya) ahe? (Kadapi nahi) allaha tyancya sahabhagi tharavinyapasuna (sud'dha) ani pavitra ahe
Jara he loka akasaca ekhada tukada jari kosalatana pahatila tari heca mhanatila ki he tharavara thara dhaga aheta
Tevha tumhi tyanna soda, yethe paryarnta ki yanci apalya tya divasasi bheta vhavi jyata he besud'dha kele jatila
Jya divasi tyanna tyanci cala (kheli) kahica kami yenara nahi ani na tyanna madata keli ja'ila
Nihsansaya, atyacari lokankarita yakherijahi an'ya siksa-yatana aheta, parantu tya lokampaiki adhikansa loka he janata nahita
Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya adesacya pratikseta dhira - sanyama rakha. Nihsansaya, tumhi amacya dolyansamora ahata ani sakali jevha tumhi uthala, apalya palanakartyaci pavitratesaha prasansa kara
Ani ratri dekhila tyace mahimagana kara ani taryancya astasa janyacya velihi
Taryaci sapatha ahe, jevha to kosalela
Ki tumaca sathidara na vata cukalela ahe, na to vakadya margavara ahe
Ani na apalya marjine to kahi bolato
Ti tara kevala vahayi (akasavani) ahe, ji avatarita keli jate
Tyala purna samarthyasali pharistyane sikavile ahe
Jo motha saktisali ahe, maga to sarala ubha rahila
Ani to ati ucca akasacya kinarya (ksitija) vara hota
Maga javala ala ani avatarala
Tevha to dona kamani'itakya antaravara rahila, kimbahuna tyahuna kami
Maga tyane allahacya dasala sandesa pohacavila, jo kahi pohacavila
Hrdayane khote mhatale nahi, je (paigambara) ne pahile
Kaya tumhi tya gostibaddala vada ghalata, je paigambara pahatata
Tyala tara anakhi eka veli pahile hote
‘Sidaratula muntaha’cya javala
Tyacyaca nikata ‘jannatula mava’ ahe
Jevha sidarala lapavuna gheta hoti, ti vastu, ji tyavara acchadita hota hoti
Na tara drsti valali, na maryadecya pudhe geli
Niscitaca tyane apalya palanakartyacya mothamothya nisanyampaiki kahi nisanya pahilya hotya
Kaya tumhi ‘lata’ ani ‘ujja’la pahile
Ani tisarya antima ‘manata’la
Kaya tumacyasathi putra ani tya (allaha) sathi kan'ya aheta
Hi tara mothi an'yayapurna vatani ahe

Vastavika ti kevala nave aheta, ji tumhi ani tumacya vadavadilanni tyanna thevali aheta. Allahane tyanci konatihi sanada avatarita keli nahi. He loka tara kevala atakala (bhrama) ani apalya manacya iccha akanksammage lagale aheta. Ani nihsansaya, tyancya palanakartyatarphe tyancyajavala margadarsana ye'una pohocale ahe
Kaya pratyeka manusya ji kamana dekhila karila ti tyala sadhya ho'ila
Allahakaritaca ahe he visva ani ti akhirata
Anakhi kititari phariste akasammadhye aheta, jyanci sipharasa kahica upayogi padu sakata nahi, matra hi gosta vegali ki allaha apalya icchene va apalya khusine jyala icchila ajna (anumati) de'ila
Nihsansaya, je loka akhiratavara imana rakhata nahi, te pharistyanna strirupi devatanci nave detata
Vastavika tyanna yace kahica jnana nahi. Te kevala apalya bhramacya mage lagale aheta ani nihsansaya, bhrama (ani anumana) satyasamora kahica upayogi padata nahi
Tevha tumhi tyacyakaduna tonda phiravuna ghya, jo amacya smaranampasuna tonda phiravila ani jyanca uddesa kevala aihika jivanakherija kahi nasava
Hica tyancya jnanaci sima ahe. Tumaca palanakarta tyala cangalya prakare janato, jo tyacya margapasuna vicalita jhala ahe ani toca cangalya prakare janato tyala dekhila, jo sanmargavara ahe

Ani allahaceca ahe, je kahi akasammadhye ahe ani je kahi dharatita ahe, yasathi ki tyane (allahane) duskarma karanaryanna tyancya karmanca mobadala dyava ani satkarma karanarya lokanna cangala mobadala dyava

Je loka mothamothe aparadha ani ughada nirlajjatecya krtyampasuna dura rahatata, yakherija ki kahi lahana sahana aparadha tyancyakaduna ghadatata, nihsansaya, (asa lokansathi) tumacya palanakartyaci ksamasilata ati visala ahe. To tumhala cangalya prakare janato, jevha tyane tumhala jaminituna nirmana kele ani jevha tumhi apalya matancya garbhata mula (arbhaka) hote tevha tumhi apale pavitrya svatah sangu naka. Toca neka - sadacari lokanna cangalya prakare janato
Kaya tumhi tyala pahile, jyane tonda phiravuna ghetale
Ani phara kami dile ani hata rokhala
Kaya tyala paroksa jnana ahe ki to (sarva kahi) pahata ahe
Kaya tyala tya gostici khabara nahi dili geli, ji musa (alai.) Cya granthata hoti
Ani ekanistha ibrahima (alai.) Cya granthata hoti
Ki konatahi manusya dusarya konacehi ojhe ucalanara nahi
Ani he ki pratyeka manasakarita kevala teca ahe, jyaca tyane svatah prayatna kela
Ani he ki nihsansaya, tyaca prayatna lavakaraca pahila ja'ila
Maga tyala purepura mobadala dila ja'ila
Ani he ki tumacya palanakartya (allaha) kadeca pohacayace ahe
Ani he ki toca hasavito ani toca radavito
Ani he ki toca marato ani toca jivanta karato
Ani he ki tyaneca joda arthata nara - madi nirmana kela
Viryapasuna jevha to tapakavila jato
Ani he ki dusaryanda jivanta karane tyacica jababadari ahe
Ani he ki toca dhanavana banavito ani dhana deto
Ani he ki toca se'ara (tarya) ca svami va palanakarta ahe
Ani he ki tyaneca pahilya adala nasta kele ahe
Ani samudala dekhila, (jyapaiki) ekalahi sillaka thevale nahi
Ani tyacyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhala. Nihsansaya, te mothe atyacari ani udhdata loka hote
Ani ‘mutaphika’ (sahara kinva palathya padalelya vastyanna) tyaneca palathe ghatale
Maga tyancyavara acchadita kele, je kahi acchadita kele
Tevha he manava! Tu apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya krpa denagi (nemata) baddala vada karasila
He (paigambara) khabaradara karanare aheta, purvi ho'una gelelya khabaradara karanaryampaiki
Yenari vela (ghatika) javala ye'una thepali ahe
Allahasivaya tila jahira karanara an'ya koni nahi
Tevha kaya tumhi ya gostivara ascarya karata
Ani hasata ahata, radata nahi
(Kimbahuna) tumhi khelata ahata
Ata allahasamora sajade kara (matha teka) ani (tyacica) upasana kara
Kayamata javala ali ani candra dubhangala
He jevha ekhada mojija (camatkara) pahatata, tevha tonda phiravitata, ani mhanatata hi tara pahilyapasuna calata aleli jadu ahe
Ani tyanni khote tharavile va apalya iccha akanksance anusarana kele. Ani pratyeka karya niscita velevaraca nirdharita ahe
Nihsansaya, tyacyajavala tya varta ye'una pohacalya aheta, jyata tambi - takidi (ci sikavana) aheta
Ani purna bud'dhikausalyaci gosta ahe, parantu ya bhayabhita karanarya gostinnihi kahi labha dila nahi
(Tevha, he paigambara!) Tumhi tyancyakaduna tonda phirava, jya divasi eka pukaranara apriya gostikade bolavila
He jhukalelya netranni kabarimadhuna asa prakare uthuna ubhe rahatila ki janu itastatah pasaralela tola thava
Pukaranaryakade dhavata jata asatila ani kaphira mhanatila ki ha divasa tara motha kathina ahe
Tyancyapurvi nuhacya janasamuhanehi amacya dasala khote tharavile hote. Ani veda darsavuna jhidakarale hote
Tevha tyane apalya palanakartyajavala du'a (prarthana) keli ki mi tavadita sapadalelo ahe. Tu majhi madata kara
Tevha amhi akasace daravaje musaladhara pavasane ughadale
Ani jaminituna jhare pravahita kele, tevha tya karyasathi je bhagyata lihile gele hote, (doghehi) pani ekatrita jhale
Ani amhi tyala asa nauketa cadhavile, ji takte ani mekha asaleli hoti
Ji amacya dolyansamora calata hoti. Ha mobadala tyacyatarphe, jyaca inkara kela gela hota
Ani nihsansaya, amhi ya ghatanela nisani banavuna baki rakhale tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Tevha (sanga) kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'anala samajanyakarita sope kele ahe1 tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Adacya janasamuhanehi khote tharavile tevha kasa hota majha azaba ani majhi bhayapurna tambi
Amhi tyancyavara satata vegane vahanari hava (vadali vara) eka satatacya asubha divasi pathavili
Ji lokanna ucaluna apatata hoti, janu mulasakata ukhadalele khajurice vrksa aheta
Tevha kasa hota majha prakopa ani majhe bhayabhita karane
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'ananala bodhapraptikarita sope kele ahe tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Samudacya janasamuhane (hi) khabaradara karanaryanna khote tharavile
Ani mhanale ki, kaya amacyapaikica eka manasace amhi anusarana karu lagave? Maga tara amhi avasya va'itapanata ani vedepanata padalele asu
Kaya amha sarvammadhuna phakta tyacyavaraca vahayi (prakasana) avatarita keli geli? Tevha to khotarada, ghamendi ahe
Ata sarva januna ghetila ki udya kona khotarada va ghamendi hota
Nihsansaya, amhi tyancya kasotikarita sandani pathavu tevha (he svaleha!) Tumhi tyanci pratiksa kara ani dhira sanyama rakha
Ani tyanna khabara dya ki panyaci tyacyata vatani ahe. Pratyeka apalya palivara hajara ho'ila
Tevha tyanni apalya sathidarala bolavile, jyane (sandanivara) halla kela ani (ticya) ghodanasa kapuna takalya
Tevha kasa hota majha azaba ani majhe bhayabhita karane
Amhi tyancyavara eka bhayankara citkara pathavila tevha te ase jhale, janu kumpana banavinaryaci tudavileli ghasa (cara)
Ani amhi bodhapraptikarita kura'anala sope kele ahe tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Lutacya janasamuhane dekhila khabaradara karanaryanna khote tharavile
Nihsansaya, amhi tyancyavara dagadanca varsava karanari hava pathavili, luta (alai.) Yancya kutumbiyankherija, tyanna pratahkali amhi suraksa (mukti) pradana keli
Apalya krpene pratyeka krtajnasila (dasa) la amhi asa prakare mobadala deto
Nihsansaya, tya (luta) ne tyanna amacya pakadice bhaya dakhavile hote, parantu tyanni bhaya dakhavinaryambabata sanka dharuna vada ghatala
Ani luta (alai.) Yanna tyancya atithincya sandarbhata phusa lavu icchile tevha amhi tyance dole andhale kele (ani sangitale), majhya siksa - yataneci va bhayapurna tambici godi cakha
Ani niscita ahe ki tyanna sakalica eka thikani dharanarya nirdharita azaba (isasikse) ne nasta karuna takale
Tevha majhya prakopaca ani majhya tambica svada cakha
Ani nihsansaya, amhi kura'anala bodha ani upadesakarita sope kele ahe. Tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Ani phira'aunacya lokanjavalahi khabaradara karanare ale
Tyanni amacya sarva nisanyanna khote tharavile tevha amhi tyanna mothya jabaradasta ani saktisali pakadanaryapramane pakadale
(He makkacya lokanno!) Kaya tumacya samudayatila kaphira tya samudayancya kaphirampeksa srestha aheta ki tumacyasathi purvicya granthammadhye sutaka lihileli ahe
Kaya he ase mhanatata ki amhi varcasvasali honare loka ahota
Lavakaraca ha samuha parabhuta kela ja'ila ani patha dakhavuna pala kadhila
Kimbahuna kayamataci vela, tyancya vayadyaci vela ahe ani kayamata atisaya kathina ani mothi katu baba ahe
Nihsansaya, aparadhi loka margabhrastateta ani yataneta aheta
Jya divasi te tondaghasi paduna agita pharaphatata nele jatila (ani tyanna sangitale ja'ila) jahannamacya agicya sparsaci godi cakha
Nihsansaya, amhi pratyeka gosta eka (nirdharita) anumanavara nirmana keli ahe
Ani amaca adesa kevala ekada (ca eka sabda) ca asato, jase papanice lavane
Ani amhi tumacyasarakhya kityekanna nasta karuna takale ahe, tevha ahe koni bodha grahana karanara
Ani je je (karma) tyanni kele ahe te sarva karmapatrata lihilele ahe
(Asa prakare) pratyeka lahana mothi gosta lihileli ahe
Nihsansaya, allahace bhaya rakhanare loka jannata ani pravahammadhye asatila
Sacoti va pratisthecya sthani samarthyasali malaka (allaha) javala
Dayavana (rahamana) ne
Kura'ana sikavile
Tyaneca manavala nirmana kele
Tyala bolane sikavile
Surya ani candra (nirdharita) hisobace palana karatata
Ani tare va vrksa doghe sajada karatata
Tyaneca akasala unca kele ani tyaneca tula (taraju) rakhali
Yasathi ki tumhi tolanyata maryadece ullanghana na karave
Ani n'yayasaha tola ucita rakha ani tolanyata kami de'u naka
Ani tyaneca srstikarita jaminila bichavile
Jicyata meve aheta ani gucchancya khajurice vrksa aheta
Ani bhusedara dhan'ya ahe ani sugandhita phule aheta
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyane manavala khanakhananarya matipasuna nirmana kele, ji thikarisarakhi hoti
Ani jinnanna agnisikhepasuna nirmana kele
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
To donhi purvanca ani donhi pascimanca svami ahe
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyane dona samudra pravahita kele je ekamekasa milatata
Tya doghancya daramyana eka ada (padada) ahe ki tyapudhe ja'u sakata nahita
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya doghammadhuna moti ani pravala nighatata
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani allahacyaca (adhikarakakseta) aheta ti jahaje, ji samudrata parvatansarakhi unca (ubhi) calata aheta
Tevha (he jinnanno ani manavanno!) Tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Jaminivara je kahi ahe te sarva nasa pavanare ahe
Kevala tumacya palanakartyace mukha (astitva), jo motha mahana ani pratistha balaganara ahe, baki rahila

Akasammadhye va jaminivara je je aheta sarva tyacyacakade yacana karatata, pratyeka divasa to eka karyata ahe

Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala

Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tumacyavara agice nikhare ani dhura sodala ja'ila, maga tumhi samana karu sakanara nahita
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Maga jevha akasa vidirna ho'una lala ho'ila, janu lala camade asave
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya divasi konatyahi manavala ani konatyahi jinnala tyacya aparadhanvisayi vicarana keli janara nahi
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Aparadhi loka kevala apalya ceharya-moharyavarunaca olakhale jatila ani tyancya kapalace kesa va paya dharale jatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Hica ti jahannama ahe, jila aparadhi khote manata hote
Ticya garama ukalatya panyacya daramyana phera khatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani tya manasakarita, jo apalya palanakartyasamora ubhe rahanyasa ghabarala, dona jannata aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Donhihi jannati aneka sakha asalelya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya donhi jannatimmadhye dona vahate jhare aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya donhim (jannatim) madhye pratyeka mevyace dona prakara asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Jannatamadhye rahanare asa bichayatinvara takke lavuna basatila, jyance astara jada resamace asela ani tya donhi jannatinci phale (meve) khupa javala asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tithe (lajalu) khali najara thevanarya hura (parya) aheta, jyanna tyancyapurvi konatyahi jinna ani manavane hata lavala nasela
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya (hura-parya) manika (yakuta) ani pravalasarakhya asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Bhalepanaca mobadala, bhalepanasivaya dusara kaya ahe
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Ani tyacyakherija dona jannati anakhi aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Donhi gadhahiravya rangacya
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyancyata dona (vegane) ucambalanare jhare aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tya doghammadhye meve anakhi khajuri va dalimba asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyancyata satsila caritryavana sundara striya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
(Gauravarniya) hura (parya) jannatacya khemyammadhye rahanarya aheta
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Tyam (hura - parya) na konatyahi manava ani jinnane yapurvi hata lavala nahi (sparsahi kela nahi)
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Hiravya gadya ani sundara bichan'yanvara takke lavuna basale asatila
Tevha tumhi apalya palanakartyacya konakonatya upakaranna khote tharavala
Mothe subha (ani samrd'dhasali) ahe tumacya palanakartyace nava, jo motha pratapasali ani motha
Jevha kayamata prasthapita ho'ila
Jice ghaduna yenyata kahica asatya nahi
Ti vara-khali karanari asela
Jevha jamina bhukampasaha halavuna takali ja'ila
Ani parvata agadi kana - kana kele jatila
Maga te vikhuralelya dhulisarakhe hotila
Ani tumhi tina gatata vibhagale jala
Tevha ujavya hatace, kiti cangale aheta ujavya hatace
Ani davya hatace, kaya avastha ahe davya hatacya lokanci
Ani je pudhe janare aheta, te tara ahetaca pudhe janare
Te agadi sannidhya prapta kelele aheta
Sukha-vilasacya jannatimmadhye aheta
(Phara motha) samuha tara purvi ho'una gelelyampaiki asela
Ani thodese nantaracya lokampaiki
(He loka) son'yacya taranni vinalelya asananvara
Ekamekansamora takke lavuna basale asatila
Tyancyajavala asi mule, ji nehami (muleca) rahatila, ye-ja karatila
Pyale ani sura'i ghe'una ani madyaca pyala ghe'una, jo madyane bharuna vahata asela
Jyamule na doke garagaru lagela ani na bud'dhi bhrasta ho'ila
Ani ase meve ghe'una, je te pasanta karatila
Ani paksyance mansa, je tyanna (phara) avadela
Ani mothamothya dolyancya (mrganayani) hura (parya)
Jya lapalelya motyansarakhya aheta
Ha mobadala ahe tyacya karmanca
Tithe na te nirarthaka gosta aikatila ani na aparadhaci gosta
Kevala salamaca salama (santi salamati) ca avaja asela
Ani ujavya hatace kiti cangale aheta ujavya hatace
Ti kate nasaleli bore
Ani tharanvara thara keli
Ani lamba lamba savalya
Ani vahate pani
Ani khupa jasta phalammadhye
Je na sampatila, na rokhale jatila
Ani unca unca bichayativara asatila
Amhi tya (cya patnim) na khasa prakare banavile ahe
Ani amhi tyanna kumarika banavile ahe
Prema karanarya, samavayaska aheta
Ujavya hatacya lokankarita ahe
(Phara) motha samuha ahe purvicya lokampaiki
Ani (phara) motha samuha ahe nantaracya lokampaiki
Ani davya hatace, kase aheta davya hatace
Usna hava ani garama (ukalatya) panyata asatila
Ani kalyakutta dhuracya savalita
Ji na thanda aheta na sukhadayaka
Nihsansaya he loka yapurvi phara sukha-sampanna avastheta vadhale hote
Ani ghora aparadhanvara agraha karita hote
Ani mhanata ki kaya jevha amhi marana pavu ani mati va hade ho'una javu tara kaya amhi dusaryanda jivanta karuna ubhe kele javu
Ani kaya amace vadavadila dekhila
(Tumhi) sanga ki nihsansaya, sarva purvice ani nantarace
Eka nirdharita divasacya veli avasya ekatra kele jatila
Maga tumhi he margabhrasta jhalelyanno, khote tharavinaryanno
Jakkumace jhada jarura khala
Ani tyacyaneca pota bharala
Maga tyavara garama ukalate pani pyala
Maga pinarehi tahanalelya untansarakhe
Kayamatacya divasi tyanca haca pahunacara ahe
Amhi tumha sarvanna nirmana kele, maga tumhi ka nahi manata
Bare he tara sanga ki je virya tumhi tapakavita
Kaya tyapasuna (manava) tumhi banavitata ki amhi nirmana karato
Amhica tumacya daramyana mrtyula bhagya (niscita) kele ahe, ani amhi tyapasuna haralelo nahi
Ki tumacya jagi tumacyasarakhe dusare nirmana karaveta, ani tumhala navya rupata (ya jagata) nirmana karave, je tumhi janata nahita
Ani tumhala pahilya nirmitice jnanahi ahe, tarihi tumhi bodha ka nahi prapta karita
Bare, maga hehi sanga ki tumhi je kahi perata
Tyala tumhi ugavita ki amhi tyasa ugavinare ahota
Amhi icchile tara tyaca curada (kana kana) karuna taku ani tumhi ascaryane bolataca rahave
Ki amacyavara tara bhurdanda padala
Kimbahuna amhi tara purnapane vancita rahilo
Bare tara he saga ki je pani tumhi pita
Tyasa dhagammadhuna tumhi avatarita kele ahe ki amhi pa'usa padato
Amhi icchile tara tya (panya) sa kadu (jahara) karuna taku, maga tumhi amacyasi krtajnata ka nahi vyakta karita
Bare hehi sanga ki ji aga tumhi petavita
Tice jhada tumhi nirmana kele ahe ki amhi tyace nirmanakarte ahota
Amhi tila bodha prapta karanyace sadhana ani pravasancya phayadyaci gosta banavile ahe
Tevha apalya mahana palanakartyacya navace gunagana kara
Tara mi sapatha gheto taryancya kosalanyaci
Ani jara tumhala jnana asela tara hi phara mothi sapatha ahe
Ki nihsansaya ha kura'ana motha pratisthasampanna ahe
Jo eka suraksita granthata (lihilela) ahe
Jyala kevala svaccha sud'dha (paka) lokaca sparsa karu sakatata
Ha sarva visvancya palanakartyatarphe avatarita kela gela ahe
Tara kaya tumhi asa gostila sadharana (ani tuccha) samajata
Ani apalya vatyala heca gheta ki yasa khote tharavita phirave
Tara jevha (prana) kanthasi ye'una pohacava
Ani tumhi tya veli (dolyanni) pahata rahave
Ani amhi tumacya tulaneta tya manasacya adhika javala asato, parantu tumhi pahu sakata nahi
Tevha jara tumhi ekhadyacya ajnecya adhina nahita
Ani tya kathanata sacce asala tara to prana paratavuna dakhava
Tara jo koni (allahacya darabarata) nikatatama asela
Tyacyasathi aisa'arama ahe (uttama bhojana ahe ani denagyanni yukta asi jannata ahe)
Ani jo manusya ujavya hatacya lokampaiki ahe
Tarihi salama (santi salamati) ahe tujhyasathi ki tu ujavya hatacya lokampaiki ahesa
Parantu jara koni khote tharavinarya margabhrasta lokampaiki ahe
Tara ukalatya panyane tyaca pahunacara ahe
Ani jahannamamadhye jayace ahe
Hi (varta) agadi satya ani niscita ahe
Tevha tumhi apalya (atimahana) palanakartyacya navace pavitrya varnana kara
Akasammadhye ani dharatita je kahi ahe (te sarva) allahace mahimagana karita aheta ani to motha varcasvasali, hikamatasali ahe
Akasance ani dharatice (samasta) rajya tyaceca ahe, toca jivana deto ani mrtyuhi ani to pratyeka gostice samarthya rakhato
Toca adya ani toca antima ahe, toca ughada ani toca lapalela ahe ani to pratyeka gosta cangalya prakare jananara ahe

Toca ahe jyane akasanna va jaminila saha divasanta nirmana kele, maga arsa (sinhasana) vara uncavala to cangalya prakare janato tya gostila, ji jaminita jate ani ji ticyatuna nighate, ani ji akasatuna khali yete ani ji cadhuna akasata jate ani tumhi kothehi ‌sa, to tumacyasobata ahe ani tumhi je kahi karita ahata, allaha te pahata ahe
Akasanci va dharatici rajyasatta tyacica ahe ani samasta karya tyacyacakade paratavili jatata
Toca ratrila divasata dakhala karato ani toca divasala ratrita dakhala karato ani chati (mana) madhye lapalelya gostince to purna jnana rakhanara ahe

Allahavara ani tyacya paigambaravara imana rakha ani dhanatuna kharca kara jyata allahane tumhala (itaranca) varasa banavile ahe tevha tumacyapaiki jo koni imana rakhela ani kharca karela tara asanna phara mothe punya labhela

Tumhi allahavara imana ka nahi rakhata? Vastavika paigambara svatah tumhala apalya palanakartyavara imana rakhanyace avahana karita ahe ani jara tumhi imana rakhanare asala tara tyane tumacyakaduna drdhavacana ghetale ahe
To (allaha) ca ahe, jo apalya dasavara spasta ayati avatarita karato, yasathi ki tyane tumhala andharakaduna ujedakade n'yave. Nihsansaya allaha tumacyavara sneha, daya karanara ahe

Ani tumhala jhale tari kaya ki tumhi allahacya margata kharca nahi karita? Vastavika akasancya ani dharaticya samasta vastunca svami (ekata) allahaca ahe. Tumacyapaiki jya lokanni vijayapurvi allahacya margata dile ahe ani dharmayud'dha (jihada) kele ahe te dusaryancya samana nahita kimbahuna tyancyapeksa ucca padace aheta, jyanni vijaya praptinantara dana dile ani jihada kele. Hoya bhala'ica vayada tara allahaca tya sarvansi ahe ani je kahi tumhi karita ahata, allaha te janato
Asa kona ahe, jo allahala cangalya prakare karja de'ila, maga allaha tyacyasathi te vadhavita ja'ila ani tyaca cangala mobadala tharava

(Kayamatacya) divasi tumhi pahala ki imana rakhanarya purusance ani striyance teja (nura) tyancya pudhe pudhe ani tyancya ujavikade dhavata asela. Aja tumhala tya jannatinca subha samacara ahe, jyancya khali (thanda panyace) pravaha vahata aheta, jyata te nehami rahatila, hica mothi saphalata ahe

Tya divasi dambhika (munaphika) purusa ani dambhika striya imanadharakanna mhanatila ki amaci pratiksa tara kara ki amhihi tumacya prakasamadhuna thoda prakasa ghyava, uttara dile ja'ila ki tumhi mage phira ani prakasa sodha, maga tyancya ani yancya daramyana eka bhinta ubhi keli ja'ila, jicyata daravajahi asela, tyacya atalya bhagata rahamata (allahaci krpa) asela ani baheracya bhagata azaba (siksa - yatana) asela

He oraduna oraduna tyanna sangatila ki kaya amhi tumacyasobata navhato? Te mhanatila, ho, hote jarura, parantu tumhi svatahla margabhrastateta thevale hote. Ani pratiksa karita rahile ani sanka - sansaya karita rahile ani tumhala tumacya (nirarthaka) iccha akanksanni dhokyataca thevale yetheparyanta ki allahaca adesa ye'una pohocala ani tumhala allahacya babatita dhoka denaryane dhokyataca thevale
Tevha aja na tumacyakaduna phidiya (ani na badala) svikarala ja'ila ani na kaphirankaduna. Tumha sarvance thikana jahannama ahe. Tica tumaci sobati ahe ani te mothe va'ita thikana ahe

Kaya ajunaparyanta imana rakhanaryankarita ti vela nahi ali ki tyanci hrdaye allahacya smaranane ani je satya avatarita jhale ahe tyane komala vhavita, ani tya lokansarakhi na vhavita, jyanna yancya purvi grantha pradana kela gela, maga jevha tyancyavara eka dirgha mudata lotali, tevha tyanci hrdaye kathora jhalita ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa duracari aheta
Visvasa rakha ki allahaca dharatila ticya mrtyunantara jivanta karato. Amhi tara tumacyasathi apalya nisanya spasta sangitalya, yasathi ki tumhi samajuna ghyave
Nihsansaya, dana denare purusa ani striya ani je allahala premane cangale karja deta aheta tyancyasathi aneka patinni vadhavile ja'ila, ani tyancyasathi uttama asa mobadala ahe

Allaha ani tyacya paigambaravara je loka imana rakhatata teca apalya palanakartyajavala sacce ani sahida aheta. Tyancyasathi tyanca mobadala ani tyance divya teja ahe, ani je kupra (inkara) karatata ani amacya nisanyanna khote tharavitata te jahannami aheta

Laksata theva ki ya jagace jivana tara kevala khela tamasa ani sobha sajavata ani apasata abhimana (ani ahankara) ani dhana va santatita ekamekahuna svatahla jasta dakhavine ahe. Jyapramane pa'usa ani tyapasuna jhaleli paidavara setakaryanna sukhada vatate, maga jevha ti sukate tevha tila tumhi pivalya rangata pahatata, maga ti agadi curecura ho'una jate, ani akhiratamadhye sakta siksa-yatana ani allahaci maphi ani prasannata ahe ani ya jagace jivana kevala dhokyacya samugrisivaya anakhi kahica nahi

(Ya) dhava apalya palanakartyacya maphikade ani tya jannatakade jica vistara akasa ani jaminicya vistara'itaka ahe. Ti asa lokansathi banavili geli ahe, je allahavara ani tyacya paigambaranvara imana rakhatata, hi allahaci daya krpa ahe, jyala icchito pradana karato ani allaha motha krpavana ahe
Konatehi sankata ya jagavara yeta nahi na khasa tumacya prananvara parantu yapurvi ki amhi tyasa nirmana karave, te eka visesa granthata lihilele ahe. Nihsansaya he kama allahakarita (mothe) sope ahe

Yasathi ki tumhi apalyakaduna hiravuna ghetalya janarya gostibaddala duhkhi na vhave ani na pradana kelelya gostibaddala garvistha vhave ani sekhi miravinarya, ghamenda karanaryansi allaha prema rakhata nahi
Je (svatahhi) kanjusapana karatata ani itarannahi kanjusapana karanyaci sikavana detata, (aika!) Jo koni tonda phiravila, allaha nihsprha ani prasansesa patra ahe

Nihsansaya, amhi apalya paigambaranna (sandesavahakanna) spasta nisanya de'una pathavile ani tyancyasobata grantha ani n'yaya (taraju) avatarita kela, yasathi ki lokanni n'yayavarakayama rahave ani amhi lokhandahi avatarita kele, jyata mothi (haibata ani) takada ahe ani lokansathi itarahi aneka phayade aheta ani yasathihi ki allahane he januna ghyave ki tyaci va tyacya paigambaranci madata na pahata kona karato. Nihsansaya, allaha motha saktisali ani varcasvasali ahe

Nihsansaya, amhi nuha ani ibrahima (alai.) Yanna (paigambara banavuna) pathavile ani amhi tya doghancya santatita presitva ani grantha kayama thevala, tevha tyancyapaiki kahinni margadarsana angikarale ani tyancyapaiki bahuteka jana duracari rahile

Tyancyanantara, tarihi amhi satata apale paigambara pathavita rahilo ani tyancyanantara mariyamaca putra isala pathavile va tyanna injila (grantha) pradana kela ani tyancya anuyayincya manata prema ani dayeci bhavana thevali, parantu vairagyaca marga tyanni svatah sodhuna kadhala, amhi to tyancyasathi anivarya kela navhata, allahacya prasannateca sodha ghenyakherija, tevha tyanni tyace purnatah palana kele nahi, tari dekhila amhi tyancyapaiki jyanni imana rakhale hote, tyanna tyanca mobadala pradana kela ani tyancyapaiki adhikansa loka duracari aheta

He imana rakhanarya lokanno! Allahace bhaya balagata raha ani tyacya paigambaravara imana rakha, allaha tumhala apalya dayene duppata his'sa de'ila ani tumhala divya teja (nura) pradana karila, jyacya prakasata tumhi calala ani to (tumace aparadhihi) mapha karila, allaha motha mapha karanara atisaya dayavana ahe

He asasathi ki (allahaca) grantha balaganaryanni januna ghyave ki allahacya krpecya konatyahi hisyavara tyanca adhikara nahi ani he ki, samasta krpa allahacyaca hati ahe, to jyala icchila, de'ila ani allahaca motha krpavanta ahe
